What are you thankful for this week?: Me kuke godiya ga wannan makon?
What are you struggling with and how can: Me kuke gwagwarmaya da kuma ta yaya za mu taimaka?
How did you put into practice the script: Ta yaya kuka aiwatar da nassi / labari da muka yi nazari a ƙarshe lokacin da muka sadu?
Who did you share last week's lesson wit: Wanene kuka raba darasi na makon da ya gabata kuma ta yaya aka yi?
What needs did you meet in the community: Wadanne bukatun da kuka hadu a cikin al'umma makon da ya gabata?
Ask someone to read the passage one para: Nemi wani ya karanta nassi ɗaya sakin layi a lokaci guda.
Have a group member tell it in their own: Da membobin kungiyar suna gaya masa a cikin kalmomin nasu.
Ask the group if they added anything or: Tambayi rukunin idan suka kara wani abu ko hagu.
When you finish with ALL paragraphs, ask: Idan kun gama da dukkan sakin layi, tambayi wani a cikin rukunin don ba da labarin ta hanyar ƙwaƙwalwa. Da ƙungiyar daidai kowane kurakurai.
What does this passage tell us about God: Menene wannan nassi ya gaya mana game da Allah?
What does this passage tell us about peo: Menene wannan nassi ya gaya mana game da mutane?
If this passage is true, what behaviour: Idan wannan nassi gaskiya ne, menene hali ya kamata mu canza wannan makon?
Who will you tell this story to this wee: Wanene za ku faɗi wannan labarin ga wannan makon?
What needs can we meet in the community: Wadanne irin bukatun zamu iya haduwa a cikin al'umma a wannan makon?
When do you want to meet again?: Yaushe kuke so ku sake haduwa?
Would you like to discover with your fri: Kuna so ku gano tare da abokanku abin da Allah yake kama da yadda Allah yake son ku rayu?
Here are some questions to get your disc: Ga wasu tambayoyi don fara tattaunawar ku.
Would you like to discover for yourself: Shin kana son gano kanka da abin da Allah yake kamar kuma yadda Allah yake son ka rayu?
Most people like to make these discoveri: Yawancin mutane suna son yin waɗannan binciken a cikin rukuni tare da abokansu.
